entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
